response.original_title: Revenge of the Sith: Ultimate Edition
response.overview: From Tales of the Empire, Tales of the Jedi, Jedi: Fallen Order, Obi-Wan Kenobi, and The Mandalorian into my STAR WARS: Revenge of the Sith Ultimate & Extended Edition fan edits; which collect the stories of Revenge of the Sith, deleted scenes from the film (now upscaled in HD), The Clone Wars finale arc, and The Bad Batch premiere; and places them into one (or two) extremely long films.
response.tagline: STAR WARS: Revenge of the Sith Ultimate Edition
response.title: Revenge of the Sith: Ultimate Edition
